title: Article 3 - Policies and Standards Governing Provision of Medical and Dental Care
content:
Article 3 - Policies and Standards Governing Provision of Medical and Dental Care

State Regulations

Part 505 - Charges For Professional Health Services (§ 505.1 to 505.39)

Part 506 - Dental Care (§ 506.1 to 506.5)

Part 507 - Health Supervision And Medical Care For Children (§ 507.1 to 507.5)

Part 508 - Child/teen Health Plan (c/thp) (§ 508.0 to 508.12)

Part 509 - Tuberculosis Care (§ 509.1 to 509.3)

Part 510 - Chiropractic Services (§ 510.1 to 510.4)

Part 511 - Medical Care-utilization review (§ 511.1 to 511.14)

Part 512 - Drug Utilization Review (§ 512.1 to 512.4)

Part 513 - Prior Approval Of Medical, Dental And Remedial Care (§ 513.0 to 513.8)

Part 514 - Provider Verification Of Recipient Eligibility And Orders For Service (§ 514.1 to 514.7)

Part 515 - Provider Sanctions (§ 515.1 to 515.19)

Part 516 - Monetary Penalties (§ 516.1 to 516.3)

Part 517 - Provider Audits (§ 517.1 to 517.17)

Part 518 - Recovery And Withholding Of Payments Or Overpayments (§ 518.1 to 518.9)

Part 519 - Provider Hearings (§ 519.1 to 519.25)

Part 520 - Tax Refund Offset For Overpayments Of Medical Assistance (§ 520.1 to 520.5)

Part 521 - Fraud, Waste and Abuse Prevention (Subpart 521-1 to 521-3)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
